title: Cisco Application Centric Infrastructure
descriptionMarkdown: [Cisco Application Centric Infrastructure (ACI)](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/collateral/data-center-virtualization/application-centric-infrastructure/solution-overview-c22-741487.html) data connector provides the capability to ingest [Cisco ACI logs](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/aci/apic/sw/all/syslog/guide/b_ACI_System_Messages_Guide/m-aci-system-messages-reference.html) into Microsoft Sentinel.
additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**CiscoACIEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CiscoACI-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

sampleQueries.query:
CiscoACIEvent
 | where notempty(DstResourceId)
 | summarize count() by DstResourceId
 | top 10 by count_

dataTypes.name: Syslog (CiscoACIEvent)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CiscoACIEvent
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
CiscoACIEvent
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**CiscoACIEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CiscoACI-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
>**NOTE:**  This data connector has been developed using Cisco ACI Release 1.x

instructionSteps.title: 1. Configure Cisco ACI system sending logs via Syslog to remote server where you will install the agent.
instructionSteps.description: [Follow these steps](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/aci/apic/sw/1-x/basic-config/b_ACI_Config_Guide/b_ACI_Config_Guide_chapter_010.html#d2933e4611a1635) to configure Syslog Destination, Destination Group, and Syslog Source.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Install and onboard the agent for Linux or Windows
instructionSteps.description:
Install the agent on the Server to which the logs will be forwarded.

> Logs on Linux or Windows servers are collected by **Linux** or **Windows** agents.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Linux agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Linux Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Linux Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Windows agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Windows Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Windows Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

instructionSteps.title: 3. Check logs in Microsoft Sentinel
instructionSteps.description:
Open Log Analytics to check if the logs are received using the Syslog schema.

>**NOTE:** It may take up to 15 minutes before new logs will appear in Syslog table.
